title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Machine Learning-Based Optimization for High-Entropy Alloy Coating Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: The design principles of corrosion resistance in high-entropy alloy coatings can be explained.
A multivariate optimization process utilizing a machine learning model (Random Forest) can be performed in a simulated environment
Multiobjective optimization results applying a genetic algorithm can be interpreted and utilized in experimental design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
